About the job
, Permanent Position: Salesforce Developer Company Overview: Freelancerprox is a leading technology services company based in Washington D.C. We specialize in providing cutting-edge solutions to our clients in various industries, including healthcare, finance, and government. Job Description: We are seeking an experienced Salesforce Developer to join our team on a full-time, permanent basis. As a Salesforce Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing custom solutions using the Salesforce platform. You will work closely with our clients to understand their business needs and translate them into scalable and efficient Salesforce solutions. Key Responsibilities:

About the job
Job Overview:

We are looking for a highly skilled and experienced Senior ReactJS / NodeJS Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate should have strong expertise in ReactJS and NodeJS, with a good understanding of React Native for mobile development. The candidate will be responsible for developing high-performance web applications, ensuring scalability, and collaborating closely with cross-functional teams.

About the job
We are looking for an ambitious and self-driven Front-end Developer to join our team. As a Front-end Developer, you will be responsible for implementing visual elements that users see and interact with within a web application, which makes your role crucial for the success of our business.

Use a variety of programming languages to create user-friendly web pages
Maintain and improve the company website

job_title: Backend Engineer (JAVA), Makro Head Office - REMOTE
job_description:
About the job
Your Challenge

Collaborate with development teams and product managers to design and implement robust backend solutions. Build scalable and secure applications, including client-side and server-side architecture. Develop, test, and maintain well-functioning APIs, ensuring performance and reliability. Analyze existing systems and plan refactoring to align with enterprise architecture standards. Implement abstractions to support interchangeable source and destination systems via connectors. Work as part of agile Scrum teams to deliver high-quality solutions.

About the job
VinAudit.com Inc. is a data and analytics startup specialized in automotive data. Since launching in 2011, VinAudit.com has aggregated billions of vehicle-related records, helped millions of consumers evaluate a car purchase, and served thousands of automotive businesses with access to our unique datasets. Our head office is in Washington State, USA, and we have a subsidiary in Canada.

We are now seeking software professionals to grow our business. You would be joining a team of around 50+ individuals who work remotely and globally including in the United States, Canada, the Philippines, India and Pakistan, and China

Work Setup:

Preferred location: Remote, supporting US-based business
Work Hours: Monday - Friday, 9:00 am - 5:00 pm Pacific Time (US)


Compensation and Benefits:

USD 2,200 per month, depending on skill level
Profit sharing
Employer sponsored Health Plan


Responsibilities:

Leading the design, implementation, and rollout of key backend systems and data products.
Managing production systems to maintain high quality and reliability for our clients.
Collaborating with other developers and team members to promote our collective growth.
Developing and maintaining documentation for software systems and applications.
Mentoring junior developers to help them improve their skills and knowledge.
Optimizing our production systems to be as maintenance-free as possible.


Opportunities:

Leading major development initiatives from design to deployment.
Leveraging our original datasets to tackle unsolved, industry-wide problems.
Optimizing our systems and processes across the full stack.
Exploring new ideas around data-oriented web businesses.


Qualifications and requirements: If the answer to most of the following questions is YES, lets talk!

Do you have a passion for software development that extends beyond school and work?
Have you completed some meaningful side projects that you can tell us about?
Are you comfortable with Linux, Python / PHP, Python, SQL databases, and similar technologies?
Do you have experience of designing, building and supporting a production system from scratch?
Are you comfortable working remotely and independently while staying in good communication with various stakeholders?


This is a unique and challenging role that will require someone who is able to jump in independently on new projects, communicate clearly with our distributed team, and write a lot of well-organized code each day. If this has piqued your curiosity, please reply with an explanation for your interest to help us kick off the conversation.

Important Note: Only those who are shortlisted will be contacted. We look forward to meeting the right person for this role!

About the job
Company Profile

EpicMetry is a dynamic venture studio based in the vibrant city of Karachi. Our passion lies in harnessing cutting-edge technology to drive innovation and empower businesses across diverse industries. With a focus on excellence and a commitment to delivering exceptional solutions, we serve as a trusted partner for companies aiming to thrive in today's digital landscape. From web and mobile app development to product prototyping and data processing automation, EpicMetry offers a comprehensive suite of services tailored to meet the evolving needs of businesses worldwide. Join us as we shape the future of technology and create impactful solutions that drive success for our clients.



EpicMetry is seeking a skilled Full Stack Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in crafting and maintaining robust web applications. Your focus on full stack development using Node.js, and React coupled with AWS and MongoDB expertise, ensures our applications are performant and secure. Collaborating closely with frontend teams, you'll seamlessly integrate user interfaces while staying attuned to industry trends. Your role is critical in shaping our technological landscape, driving innovation, and delivering excellence in our projects.
